title: elevates
author: elevates
content: Like most new generation forum users(those who joined after the Merits rule), I was eager to find out a way to find new topics to write on. I am sure many of us would agree with what I wrote, as my anxiety level was going up. I asked Chat GPT-3 to help me, but the result was not that satisfactory. Still, it was helpful to an extent and this is why I am sharing it. Anyone here who wants to grow up then this topic is for you.It suggested I work on 7 topics on which I need to work on. I am sharing it as I want everyone to work on these topics if they want to rank up. Code:Sure, here are a few topics that you can write about on Bitcointalk forum to potentially earn sMerits:1. Cryptocurrency News and Updates: Share the latest news and updates on various cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and more. You can also discuss the impact of current events on the crypto market.2. Trading and Investing: Share your thoughts on trading and investing strategies, technical analysis, and market trends. You can also offer advice on how to get started in cryptocurrency trading.3. Blockchain Technology: Discuss the technology behind blockchain, its uses, and potential applications in various industries.4. Decentralized Finance (DeFi): Talk about the various DeFi projects, their potential, and their challenges. You can also discuss the role of DeFi in the future of finance.5. Cryptocurrency Regulations: Discuss the current regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies and the potential impact of new regulations on the industry.6. Cryptocurrency Wallets and Security: Share your thoughts on various cryptocurrency wallets, their features, and how to keep your cryptocurrency safe and secure.7. Mining: Discuss the process of cryptocurrency mining, its profitability, and how to get started with miningRemember that to earn merits, your post should be informative, insightful, and add value to the discussion.  The end statement made me realize that everything is not that easy. You still need to do a lot of research before creating any topics to earn merits. I think if you use this AI in the correct way it will help you a lot. Treating it as a ghost writer will only get you into more trouble here. Thanks.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: OP, what can make a member here earn merit is if the member really takes note of some help that is needed by other members and then takes the time to fully explain and analyze the solution to the challenges that others are facing in the crypto space. Is not by asking AI; even most of the answers you got from that AI were insights the AI collected on some topics from this forum and other sources on the internet. Why do you think this will be able to help any member? I disagree that it would, for those who are already making good posts and have collected some merit from their topics and other comments can still earn more merit in the future if they really devote time to searching and creating some useful topics in this forum. Also, those who have not created any useful topics can only explore the AI and do some copy and paste from some articles they may find on the internet, for which they may not even earn any merit.
